messages.subject: introductions are a must shokai shimashoo

messages.messageBody:
Hello group,
Just thought that I would introduce myself. My name is John and I am
a student of Japanese language and Anthropology. My main interest, of
course, is the history and culture of Japan. What I plan to do with
this interest is unknown to me, but I was hoping to chat with some
like minded individuals in this forum. Hello.
